title: Amistad National Recreation Area: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping       Lodging  There are no motels or rental cabins located within the national recreation area. The closest city is Del Rio, Texas. Del Rio has a wide range of accommodations including hotels and motels to choose from.    Camping  Amistad offers several different types of campsites:    Designated Camping –RV and tent camping in a developed campground. All designated camping sites have not RV hookups.  Backcountry –Most are only accessible by boat and must be at least ¼ mile away from a developed area.  Group campgrounds –Large designated camping campsites suitable for large groups.     Eating There are no places to purchase food in the park. There are several restaurants along US Hwy. 90. Food can be purchased at the nearby gas stations but most restaurants and convenience stores are located in Del Rio, TX.
